response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and functionality of your operations. Given its exceptional quality and potential impact on your business, I am confident it's worth every penny of its $1,000,000 value to you. Considering its immense worth, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $950,000. This offer is exclusive to you and represents an excellent investment opportunity. Please let me know if you require any further information or if you wish to proceed with the purchase.", "product_price": 950000}
